Attackdex

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Arctic Terrain 10 — — For 5 turns, Ice type-Pokémon and Ice type-moves are stronger.
Aurora Beam 20 65 100 The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam that may also lower its Attack stat.
Aurora Veil 20 — — Damage from all moves is halved for 5 turns. This move can be used only in a hailstorm.
Avalanche 10 60 100 This attack move's power is doubled if the target has hurt the user in the same turn.
Blizzard 5 110 70 A howling blizzard strikes opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them with frostbite.
Blubber Bump 10 80 100 The user blubs into the target. This move's power scales with the user's Sp. Def stat.
Chilly Reception 10 0 — A chillingly bad joke summons a snowstorm for 5 turns.
Freeze-Dry 20 70 100 The target is rapidly cooled and may be frostbitten. It is super effective on Water types.
Freeze Shock 5 140 90 On the second turn, the target is hit with electrically charged ice that may paralyze.
Freezy Frost 15 90 100 Crystal from cold haze hits. Eliminates all stat changes.
Frost Breath 10 60 90 The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
Frost Burn 15 — 85 The user lets loose a chilling burn that leaves the target with frostbite.
Glacial Lance 5 130 100 The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.
Glacial Rift 10 100 100 The user attacks everything around it with a fracture that hurts frostbitten Pokémon more.
Glacial Torque 10 100 100 A frozen spinning attack that may inflict a frostbite.
Glaciate 10 65 95 The user blows freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stats.
Hail 10 — — The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except Ice types.
Haze 30 — — The user creates a haze that eliminates all stat changes among all Pokémon in battle.
Ice Ball 20 30 90 The user attacks the target for five turns. The move's power increases each time it hits.
Ice Beam 10 90 100 The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy which may leave it with frostbite.
Ice Burn 5 140 90 On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind that may burn surrounds the target.
Ice Fang 15 65 95 The user bites with ice-cold fangs. It may also make the target flinch or frostbitten.
Ice Hammer 10 100 90 The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.
Ice Punch 15 75 100 The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
Ice Shard 30 40 100 The user hurls flash-frozen chunks of ice at the target. This move always goes first.
Ice Spinner 15 80 100 The user twirls around to slam the foe. It destroys active Terrain.
Icicle Burst 10 — 100 The user retaliates any hit with greater power. The target may be left with frostbite.
Icicle Crash 10 85 90 The user harshly drops large icicles onto the target. This may also make it flinch.
Icicle Spear 30 25 100 The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.
Icy Wind 15 55 95 The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.
Mist 30 — — The user cloaks its side in mist preventing any stats from being lowered for five turns.
Mountain Gale 5 100 85 The user hurls giant ice chunks to inflict damage. It may cause flinching.
Powder Snow 25 40 100 The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also frostbite.
Sheer Cold 5 — 30 The target faints instantly. It's less likely to hit if used by Pokémon other than Ice types.
Snowscape 10 0 — The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.
Triple Axel 10 20 90 A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each hit.
